title: EluguHcman
author: EluguHcman
content: Your morning comes when you are ready and when it comes, it comes with a good tidy.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Quote from: EluguHcman on July 18, 2023, 12:19:09 PMYour morning comes when you are ready and when it comes, it comes with a good tidy.Our morning is depend if we will still wake up in the morning or not  because once we are dead no one can hold our tomorrow even us.and also we are the one responsible for our morning , if we wanted this to be good and healthy or if we wanted to be negative.but correct that our tomorrow depends on what we will be working for this.

comments.author: Natsuu
comments.body: Quote from: EluguHcman on July 18, 2023, 12:19:09 PMYour morning comes when you are ready and when it comes, it comes with a good tidy.it is a good reminder to tell yourself everyday before you get out of bed. it's like a daily mantra encouraging self-awareness and readiness, reminding you that your morning unfolds positively when you're prepared and it brings a sense of order to your day. We have to approach each morning with a proactive mindset.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: The fact is you can't hold tomorrow and you can't boast what's with tomorrow. You don't know what can happen tomorrow but you have the power and control of what's happening now.While if it's about morning, just cherish the time everytime you wake up because you'll not know if the next tomorrow comes with uncertainty to yourself.

comments.author: acener
comments.body: Quote from: peter0425 on December 10, 2023, 06:11:14 AMQuote from: EluguHcman on July 18, 2023, 12:19:09 PMYour morning comes when you are ready and when it comes, it comes with a good tidy.Our morning is depend if we will still wake up in the morning or not  because once we are dead no one can hold our tomorrow even us.and also we are the one responsible for our morning , if we wanted this to be good and healthy or if we wanted to be negative.but correct that our tomorrow depends on what we will be working for this.It is true, we couldn't guarantee that there would always be a tomorrow for us, we don't know if we would ever wake up again after we sleep.And it is up to us if we want to be grateful for it, or start our day with negativity for some reason.Some of us are wishing to never wake up again, or just keep on going just for their love ones.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Quote from: acener on December 10, 2023, 11:34:17 PMQuote from: peter0425 on December 10, 2023, 06:11:14 AMQuote from: EluguHcman on July 18, 2023, 12:19:09 PMYour morning comes when you are ready and when it comes, it comes with a good tidy.Our morning is depend if we will still wake up in the morning or not  because once we are dead no one can hold our tomorrow even us.and also we are the one responsible for our morning , if we wanted this to be good and healthy or if we wanted to be negative.but correct that our tomorrow depends on what we will be working for this.It is true, we couldn't guarantee that there would always be a tomorrow for us, we don't know if we would ever wake up again after we sleep.And it is up to us if we want to be grateful for it, or start our day with negativity for some reason.Some of us are wishing to never wake up again, or just keep on going just for their love ones.There is no peaceful death than not waking up in the morning and that's why other people wish they could experienced this , some are those who have illnesses  and some are those in despair in life but the more we seek for this is the longer we have waking up in the morning.we have Obligation in life , and one of those are to stay worthy to others , and also to live happy and enjoying.this is why our tomorrow depends on how we will act on it and how we will value this.

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: There will never be a tomorrow and all we have is today is my thought so if you want your future to be better then there is no better day than making the move on the present day and delaying it will cause nothing but the dilution effect in our mind.

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: Quote from: EluguHcman on July 18, 2023, 12:19:09 PMYour morning comes when you are ready and when it comes, it comes with a good tidy.Our tomorrow depends  on how we act and work on it , We have so much to do for our future , we cannot just woke up in the morning and will get food on the table.We need to work hard ., be with people and enjoy life as well and those are what we have to satisfyeach day.Quote from: ScottHolcomb on January 13, 2024, 12:44:04 PMI think every one should hold today.We should hold all the day mate, not today not tomorrow but all the days of our life.

comments.author: ARTOIS
comments.body: There is always a new day and a new morning, and it is always different from the day before it, no matter what it was or what you went through. There is always a second chance that always comes every morning, and the matter remains up to you. You wanted to start it positively and with the determination to change something. A new day, a new life, New Morning,  new beginning..,.

comments.author: Ravichnadra
comments.body: Well for me today was a really good day with excitement. I'm from India today is RAM MANDIR PRANA PRATHISTAPNA DAY.Every Sanatani's dream day.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: Rather than the day waiting for you it is actually the opposite The day starts, the morning comes even if you are not ready whether you like it or not it can not always be night time and at some point you are going to have to face the challenges that will arise throughout the day which is why you always have to be ready If an opportunity comes, even if you are not ready there is a possibility it might not come again so grab it because the opportunities will not wait for you to be ready

comments.author: Uhwuchukwu53
comments.body: Quote from: EluguHcman on July 18, 2023, 12:19:09 PMYour morning comes when you are ready and when it comes, it comes with a good tidy.Spiritually no body knows tomorrow, even as many things about tomorrow. We can't not cease in hoping for tomorrow if it  comes, I see our morning as the present  of our hope. Scripturally say that sorrow endure for a night but joy comes in the morning. The period of preparation which seem to be a period of hardship can be over one day when the morning that bring joy comes in.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Quote from: EluguHcman on July 18, 2023, 12:19:09 PMYour morning comes when you are ready and when it comes, it comes with a good tidy.Definately readiness is one good factor of success. If one is not prepared in whatever thing he or she does in life I will affect him or she. That's why they said make haste while the sun shines. Not when it's too late you will start to struggle.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: For me when I wake up in the mornings I am grateful for another day to be alive. We can not take things like that for certain in the world we live in now.It could be the last say on the earth for us at any time. We must make the best of these times we still have on this earth. And spend it to be with loved ones and make best of our opportunity.

comments.author: bitterguy28
comments.body: Quote from: EluguHcman on July 18, 2023, 12:19:09 PMYour morning comes when you are ready and when it comes, it comes with a good tidy.I believe that we are not ready when the morning comes as we still sleeping most of the time , but we are given opportunity to be ready before going to sleep at night so  when tomorrow comes we are truly ready .but it is correct that when it comes , it comes good and tidy(at least  for me ) because I kept assuring myself to be ready all the time.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: EluguHcman on July 18, 2023, 12:19:09 PMYour morning comes when you are ready and when it comes, it comes with a good tidy.Each evening , I end the day with prayers and thanking for what have been given to me the whole day  and same us each Morning to start the day with Blissful message of love and passion .Our day will start on how we want it to be, find and seek happiness in everything around us .Quote from: mich on January 23, 2024, 08:03:00 AMFor me when I wake up in the mornings I am grateful for another day to be alive. We can not take things like that for certain in the world we live in now.It could be the last say on the earth for us at any time. We must make the best of these times we still have on this earth. And spend it to be with loved ones and make best of our opportunity. indeed, simply thanks for the given morning and do your best to be good to othes.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: peter0425 on December 10, 2023, 06:11:14 AMQuote from: EluguHcman on July 18, 2023, 12:19:09 PMYour morning comes when you are ready and when it comes, it comes with a good tidy.Our morning is depend if we will still wake up in the morning or not  because once we are dead no one can hold our tomorrow even us.and also we are the one responsible for our morning , if we wanted this to be good and healthy or if we wanted to be negative.but correct that our tomorrow depends on what we will be working for this.That's why I try to remain in mourning every morning.

comments.author: Fatema Begum
comments.body: Time and day never possible to holding anyhow but we can hope what we are Doing tomorrow and what is our plan for tomorrow or day after tomorrow like this.

comments.author: Roland_King
comments.body: We ourselves do not know whether we will be on earth tomorrow.  But still we have all the plans and our thoughts for tomorrow.  Our whole life goes on like this we think for the future.

comments.author: nngella
comments.body: Quote from: EluguHcman on July 18, 2023, 12:19:09 PM(title) You holds your tomorrowNot part of the topic nor the main discussion but the title of your post reminded me something that made me laugh.  The typical restroom of a public high school in our country has a lot of vandalisms on the wall.  One was a phrase that tells "You hold your tomorrow" written on the wall that you face while peeing.   Wahaha!  Just sending good vibes here because this post really reminds me of that funny moment. Man, you made my day.
